text: This article is about booking a hotel and the various methods you can use to do so.现在是科技时代，很多工作和生活难题都可以通过网络得到解决了。如果你想为了出行定酒店的话，以下方案可以帮助到你。被广泛使用的定酒店网站有携程，途牛等等。首先，输入你想要旅行的城市名字。如果想要更为详细的话，你可以选择想要游玩的具体位置，这样就可以查看到附近都有哪些酒店。进入酒店页面之后，可以选择自己想要的房间类型，比如单人床，双人床或者家庭房等。之后，你只需要在网上通过网银，支付宝或者微信就可以付款了。付款之后，房间就预定好了。这实在是太方便了！Now in the age of technology, many work and life problems can be solved through the internet. If you want to book a hotel for travel, the following plan might help you.The widely used hotel-booking websites include Ctrip, Tuniu and so on. First, enter the name of the city you want to travel to. If you want to be more detailed, you can choose the specific location you want to go to, so you can see which hotels are nearby.After entering the hotel’s webpage, you can choose the type of room you want, such as a single bed, double bed or family room. After that, you only have to pay online through online banking – Alipay or WeChat. After the payment is completed, the room is booked. This is really convenient!1 – 网上预定酒店的步骤是什么？（1） 选择床型 （2）付款 （3）输入城市名 （4）进入酒店页面 （5）选择具体位置2 – 携程和途牛可能是什么类型的网站？Review frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
